name: Software Developer - Python/C/C++
description:
Job Role (in brief)

Responsible for Leading and mentoring a small Software development team within a specific task or project, side by side with hands-on development. (Python)

What are the Challenges in the Role?

Part of our Product research and development team
Proficiency in, at least, two programming language such as Python, C and C++
Solid understanding of Scripting languages ( Python/ Ansible)
OS (Linux) , Hypervisors (KVM, VMWare) .
Sound understanding of Open APIs Socket and protocols, such as Restful.

name: PHP Developer
description:
Job Role (in brief)

We are looking for a PHP Developer responsible for managing back-end services and the interchange of data between the server and the users. Your primary focus will be the development of all server-side logic, definition and maintenance of the central database, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end. You will also be responsible for integrating the front-end elements built by your co-workers into the application. Therefore, a basic understanding of front-end technologies is necessary as well.

What we are looking in a Perfect Candidate:

Core PHP, HTML5, CSS3, Java Script, JQuery, Bootstrap, Ajax, Advance PHP
DBMS and RDBMS MySQL
Web Server: Apache, Tomcat
Web Services: AWS, Google API
Working knowledge on Python & Linux
Quick learner, Team player, Strong drive, Self- starter
Must be good in planning & organizing skills
Experience 3 to 5 Years
Qualification: B.Tech (CS/IT)

name: Software Testing - Home Automation
description:
Key Responsibilities and Expectations: 
  • Strong understanding of s/w testing and QA concepts
  • Understand business and technical requirements and prepare test cases / test plan from the same
  • Good verbal and written English communication
  • Must know JAVA programming language (additional knowledge Python is an added advantage)
  • Should be able to perform mobile (iOS) application testing procedures and methodologies
  • Must have API testing knowledge
  • Add to our companys performance and scalability testing efforts and improve the test frameworks, tools and technologies used by the organization to maintain a high-quality bar.
  • Should be able to log and track bugs in JIRA
  • Ability to work across Windows, Linux is a plus.
  • Exposure to mobile test automation is a big plus
  • Should be able to communicate effectively with development team.
